Quobyte | Berlin, Germany | Full-time | Onsite | https://www.quobyte.com/

Quobyte is developing a software storage system for file, block and object, built around a parallel file system core. Our customers use this data center file system for HPC clusters in industry and academia, container and OpenStack infrastructures, postproduction, origin and CGI clusters, and as a scalable backend for SaaS products.

Quobyteâ€™s data center file system is a full-stack storage system, which means that engineering work covers everything from kernel development over database design to distributed systems engineering. In short: lots of challenging and fun problems!
